subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Toronto F.C. of Major League Soccer said it had acquired the American forward Jozy Altidore from Sunderland of the Premier League and would transfer the English forward Jermain Defoe in return.
snippet: Toronto F.C. of Major League Soccer said it had acquired the American forward Jozy Altidore from Sunderland of the Premier League and would transfer the English forward Jermain Defoe in return.
